languages.text: "Он теряет много крови". {n}Целитель бросает на вас встревоженный взгляд.{/n} "Советую поспешить. Господин Данрок должен как можно скорее оказаться на столе хирургеона".
"He's losing a lot of blood." {n}The medicae officer casts a worried look at you.{/n} "I advise you to hurry. Master Danrok should be on the chirurgeon's table as soon as possible."
languages.original_text: "Он теряет много крови". {n}Целитель бросает на вас встревоженный взгляд.{/n} "Советую поспешить. Господин Данрок должен как можно скорее оказаться на столе хирургеона".

traits.locale_text: "He's losing a lot of blood." {n}The healer casts a worried look at you.{/n} "I advise you to hurry. Master Danrok should be on the chirurgeon's table as soon as possible."
"He's losing a lot of blood." {n}The healer casts a worried look at you.{/n} "I advise you to hurry. Master Danrok should be on the chirurgeon's table as soon as possible."

"He's losing a lot of blood." {n}The medicae officer casts a worried look at you.{/n} "I advise you to hurry. Master Danrok should be on the chirurgeon's table as soon as possible."

languages.text: «Está perdiendo mucha sangre». {n}El oficial medicae te mira, preocupado.{/n} «Sugiero apresurarnos. Hay que llevar al maestro Danrok a un quirófano cuanto antes».
languages.original_text: "He's losing a lot of blood." {n}The medicae officer casts a worried look at you.{/n} "I advise you to hurry. Master Danrok should be on the chirurgeon's table as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: «Está perdiendo mucha sangre». {n}El oficial medicae te mira, preocupado.{/n} «Sugiero apresurarnos. Hay que llevar al maestro Danrok a un quirófano cuanto antes».

languages.text: 「彼は大量出血しています」{n}メディケア士官が心配そうな顔をしている。 {/n}「急いでください。ダンロック様は一刻も早く外科医に見てもらうべきです」
languages.original_text: "He's losing a lot of blood." {n}The medicae officer casts a worried look at you.{/n} "I advise you to hurry. Master Danrok should be on the chirurgeon's table as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は大量出血しています」{n}メディケア士官が心配そうな顔をしている。 {/n}「急いでください。ダンロック様は一刻も早く外科医に見てもらうべきです」

languages.text: “他正在大量失血。”{n}医务官忧心忡忡地看着你。{/n}“希望您能快点，丹罗克大师得赶紧上手术台。”
languages.original_text: "He's losing a lot of blood." {n}The medicae officer casts a worried look at you.{/n} "I advise you to hurry. Master Danrok should be on the chirurgeon's table as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: “他正在大量失血。”{n}医务官忧心忡忡地看着你。{/n}“希望您能快点，丹罗克大师得赶紧上手术台。”

languages.text: "Er verliert sehr viel Blut. {n}Der Medicae-Offizier wirft dir einen besorgten Blick zu.{/n} "Ihr solltet Euch beeilen. Meister Danrok muss schnellstmöglich auf den Tisch des Chirurgeums."
languages.original_text: "He's losing a lot of blood." {n}The medicae officer casts a worried look at you.{/n} "I advise you to hurry. Master Danrok should be on the chirurgeon's table as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Er verliert sehr viel Blut. {n}Der Medicae-Offizier wirft dir einen besorgten Blick zu.{/n} "Ihr solltet Euch beeilen. Meister Danrok muss schnellstmöglich auf den Tisch des Chirurgeums."

languages.text: « Il perd beaucoup de sang. » {n}L'officier de medicae vous lance un regard inquiet.{/n} « Faites vite. Maître Danrok doit être opéré dans les plus brefs délais. »
languages.original_text: "He's losing a lot of blood." {n}The medicae officer casts a worried look at you.{/n} "I advise you to hurry. Master Danrok should be on the chirurgeon's table as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: « Il perd beaucoup de sang. » {n}L'officier de medicae vous lance un regard inquiet.{/n} « Faites vite. Maître Danrok doit être opéré dans les plus brefs délais. »

languages.text: "Çok kan kaybediyor." {n}Sıhhiye subayı sana endişeli bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Acele etmenizi tavsiye ederim. Üstat Danrok mümkün olan en kısa sürede ameliyat masasına yatmalı."
languages.original_text: "He's losing a lot of blood." {n}The medicae officer casts a worried look at you.{/n} "I advise you to hurry. Master Danrok should be on the chirurgeon's table as soon as possible."
